title: [Overland Trail]
description: The flat hilltop extends to the southeast.  Something slithers across the gravel behind a rock a few yards away, and the ever-present lizards coolly keep watch over your movements.  A group of white wildflowers have taken root in a depression on this windswept hilltop, and they display their flowers as signs of their defiance to the elements.  The moonlight glints brightly off the scoured rock surfaces.

The flat hilltop extends to the southeast.  Something slithers across the gravel behind a rock a few yards away, and the ever-present lizards coolly keep watch over your movements.  A group of white wildflowers have taken root in a depression on this windswept hilltop, and they display their flowers as signs of their defiance to the elements.  The sunlight glints painfully off the scoured rock surfaces.
